00027 int cimunit_barrier_init(cimunit_barrier_t *barrier)
00028 {
00029     pthread_mutex_init(&barrier->mutex, NULL);
00030     pthread_cond_init(&barrier->cond, NULL);
00031     barrier->is_locked = true;
00033     return 0;
00034 }
00035 
00036 
00037 int cimunit_barrier_destroy(cimunit_barrier_t *barrier)
00038 {
00039     pthread_cond_destroy(&barrier->cond);
00040     pthread_mutex_destroy(&barrier->mutex);
00042    return 0;
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 void cimunit_barrier_wait(cimunit_barrier_t *barrier)
00047 {
00048     pthread_mutex_lock(&barrier->mutex);
00049     if (barrier->is_locked)
00050     {
00051         pthread_cond_wait(&barrier->cond, &barrier->mutex);
00052         if (!barrier->is_locked)
00053         {
00054             // Let the next thread in line pass the barrier
00055             pthread_cond_signal(&barrier->cond);
00056         }
00057     }
00058     pthread_mutex_unlock(&barrier->mutex);
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 void cimunit_barrier_unlock(cimunit_barrier_t *barrier)
00063 {
00064     pthread_mutex_lock(&barrier->mutex);
00065     barrier->is_locked = false;
00066     pthread_cond_signal(&barrier->cond);
00067     pthread_mutex_unlock(&barrier->mutex);                    
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 void cimunit_barrier_lock(cimunit_barrier_t *barrier)
00072 {
00073     pthread_mutex_lock(&barrier->mutex);
00074     barrier->is_locked = true;
00075     pthread_mutex_unlock(&barrier->mutex);                    
00076 }
